title: 有什么指令能大量生成僵尸
author: 寒冰and

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
summon area_effect_cloud ~ ~1 ~ {Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"},{id:"minecraft:zombie"}]}复制代码
这是一次50只，如果想的话再多点，继续在]里粘贴,{id:"minecraft:zombie"}

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
/execute @e[type=zombie] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=zombie] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=zombie] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=zombie] ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=zombie] ~ ~ ~ summon zombie ~ ~ ~复制代码运行前先保证地图里有至少一个僵尸，有两个的话也可以，应该就是这样...
然后打散...
/spreadplayers ~ ~ 1 20 false @e[type=zombie]复制代码


或者/summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~ ~ {Attributes:[{Name:"zombie.spawnReinforcements",Base:1.0d}]}复制代码
然后/difficulty hard的时候，晚上，每次僵尸受伤都有概率拉人

↑
还有一种办法
拿出紫色的命令方块，让它不受红石信号制约
/summon zombie ~ ~ ~

(1.9适用)
